title: Impact of Brewery sludge application on heavy metal build-up, translocation, growth and yield of bread wheat (Triticum aestivum L.) crop in Northern Ethiopia
content:
Publication date: Available online 6 June 2024

Source: Heliyon

Author(s): Wakjira Tesfahun, Tessema Astatkie, Ambachew Zerfu, Hawi Deressa Kenea, Nezif Abamecha, Meresa Shumuye, Gezai Abera, Asmeret Kidane, Mignote Hirko, Fenta Assefa
